entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Toronto Island

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.3°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 63 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
